textContent:
Every now and then I see you questioning your self worth and today if you're here, then it's one such day!
Everyone of us are built like that we tend to look down upon us and that's totally fine until you start believing in it. 
And me being in love with you can't let you believe in something that's not even true, you have no idea how precious you are Umair! Not just to me but also to your family and your friends, they might not be that expressive about this but I'm sure that they too might be really proud of you. 

It's not been long enough but I've known you inside out and I know your story, all I can see is a man who has gone through different sets of emotional turmoil but still has managed to work through it, who's well raised, who knows how to respect others, who tries his best not to hurt someone he cares about and there's so much more I just can't put them into words ðŸ˜•

You put in so much effort working to build a future for yourself, your family, you're not reckless like any other boy in his early 20s, you're emotionally intelligent and available which is the most attractive thing a man can possess.

You have no idea your mere existence brings so much happiness to me, if you feel the same about me I pray that we continue to see each other this way. 

So remember that if not anyone suvi will always be proud of you ðŸ©·
title: Open when you need a reminder of your worth.
textContentHtml:
Every now and then I see you questioning your self worth and today if you're here, then it's one such day!

Everyone of us are built like that we tend to look down upon us and that's totally fine until you start believing in it. 

And me being in love with you can't let you believe in something that's not even true, you have no idea how precious you are Umair! Not just to me but also to your family and your friends, they might not be that expressive about this but I'm sure that they too might be really proud of you. 


It's not been long enough but I've known you inside out and I know your story, all I can see is a man who has gone through different sets of emotional turmoil but still has managed to work through it, who's well raised, who knows how to respect others, who tries his best not to hurt someone he cares about and there's so much more I just can't put them into words ðŸ˜•


You put in so much effort working to build a future for yourself, your family, you're not reckless like any other boy in his early 20s, you're emotionally intelligent and available which is the most attractive thing a man can possess.


You have no idea your mere existence brings so much happiness to me, if you feel the same about me I pray that we continue to see each other this way. 


So remember that if not anyone suvi will always be proud of you ðŸ©·
